import React from 'react' import logo from '../../images/res-logo.png' const BuyerHome = () => { return (

setShowProfile(true)}>Your Profile

First Name setFirstName(e.target.value)} placeholder={firstName} /> Last Name setLastName(e.target.value)} placeholder={lastName} /> Email setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder={email} /> Phone Number setPhoneNumber(e.target.value)} placeholder={phoneNumber} />
) } export default BuyerHome
